chinese: 太子自私下凡救国无果
pinyin: Tài zǐ zì sī xià fán jiù guó wú guǒ.
translation: The Crown Prince descended to earth in secret to save the country, but failed.

breakdown.meaning: Crown Prince (太 = great, 子 = son)

pinyin: Zāo biǎnfán jiān
translation: Degraded to the mortal world

breakdown.meaning: degraded, relegated (贬 = to degrade; 凡 = ordinary/mortal)

chinese: 要我说风信慕情走得好
pinyin: Yào wǒ shuō fēngxìn mù qínɡ zǒu dė hǎo.
translation: In my opinion, Feng Xin and Mu Qing did well to leave.

breakdown.meaning: particle indicating adverbial complement or possession

chinese: 感情深有什么用没前途啊-神官之耻三界笑柄
pinyin: Gǎnqíng shēnyǒu shénme yòng méiqián túa - shénguān zhī chǐ sān jiè xiàobǐng.
translation: What's the use of deep feelings? No future ahead - A Shame to the Gods, Laughingstock of the Three Realms

breakdown.meaning: particle used for emphasis or感叹 (expression of emotion)
particle used to indicate possession or relationship (of)

chinese: 之后谢怜又飞升还不是一炷香就下去了
pinyin: Zhīhòu xièlián yòu fēishēng hái búshì yī zhù xiāng jiù xiàqù le.
translation: After Xie Lian ascended again, he did not stay up there for even the time it takes to burn an incense stick before coming back down.

breakdown.meaning: after that (之 = this/that, 后 = after)
to ascend/fly up (飞 = fly, 升 = rise)
an incense stick (一 = one,  = cib, 香 = incense)
went down (下 = down, 去 = go, 了 = particle indicating completion)

pinyin: Rúguǒ bùzhī wèi hé ér huó.
translation: If you don't know why you live.

breakdown.meaning: that, so that (used in the word 知果不知所为何来)
for, because (used in the word 为何)
what (used in the word 为何)

pinyin: Nà jiù wèi wǒ huóxià qùba.
translation: Then live for me, please.

breakdown.meaning: please go (modal particle used for suggestions)
